creator: Cremalab
descriptionHtml:
Vera is care management app for plants that makes tracking as fun as the care itself, so anyone can be a successful plant parent.

Vera’s clean design makes plant care easy to understand and fun to do. This plant nanny ensures your plants thrive, empowering plant veterans and novices alike to stay on top of their watering schedule. The easy-to-use interface and beautiful design distinguishes it from typical watering reminder apps that look outdated and overly-complicated.

Current features include the capability to set up ‘plant profiles' and a watering schedule. Plant profiles include an image of the plant, the plant’s location, a name for the plant, acquisition date, special instructions and plant type. Watering schedules are easy to set up, and you’ll get watering notifications right on your phone. You can even customize when you receive notifications. Plus, we have future plants to incorporate caregivers (for when you need a plant sitter)!

Vera ignites, grows and connects the evolving global trend around plants and their owners to live more mindfully in an anxious world.
descriptionShort: Vera is a care management app for plants.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1815 Central St
Kansas City, MO 64108
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings, responsible plant parents! We've got a brand new update to help you take even better care of your little green friends.
This update includes:
- Several internal changes in the app to make it faster and more stable--with no changes to the UX you've come to know and love.
- New photo features like the ability to change the date of your photos, set specific photos as your plants' profile picture, and a helpful back/forth slide option for optimal progress tracking.

- Several internal changes in the app to make it faster and more stable
- New photo features.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1815 Central St
Kansas City, MO 64108
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey plant parents! We are very excited about this new release. We have added a few more quality of life updates to this release that will help make adding your plants smoother and easier. Specifically, updates to this version include:
- A new streamlined way of adding your plants
- There are now preset plant types to choose from when adding your plant. But of course, you can still manually add your plant type if needed.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1815 Central St
Kansas City, MO 64108
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are happy to introduce to you all Vera by Bloomscape! We know you will love the app's new look and feel! A few of the new features include:
- You now have plant care guides for plants from our greenhouse!
- Enjoy a new Learning Library so you can continue to grow your plant care knowledge
- Download your data from your settings page

title: Vera: Plant Care App

creator: Cremalab
descriptionHtml:
Vera by Bloomscape is a plant care management app that helps you and your plants thrive!

Create a Schedule:

Never leave your plant hanging again! Easily set up watering reminders and fertilizing follow-ups for every plant. Track your plants’ progress as you go and become the best plant parent.


Track Your Plants:

View your plant collection in one place, and create profiles for each leafy friend, with their name, adoption date, and photos you take. Log your plant care activities over time and watch your jungle thrive.


Document your journey:

Journal away when you’re excited for a new sprouting leaf, worried about unwanted pesty guests, or mesmerized by the way the morning light hits your Fiddle Leaf Fig just right.


Learn New Skills:

Curious how to repot your Monstera? Need to know how to trim your Money Tree? We’ve got you covered. The Library has all the plant care tips and tricks you’ll ever need. Plant Mom approved, of course!
descriptionShort: Vera by Bloomscape is a care management app for plants.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1815 Central St
Kansas City, MO 64108
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you to those who reported issues to our team! This update:
- Fixes keyboard issues when adding “Special Instructions”, Adding watering and fertilization dates.
- Fixes bug that caused app to crash when adding plants manually.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1815 Central St
Kansas City, MO 64108
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update, we wanted to update your homepage to give you more flexibility to care for plants in a way that better matches your routine!

• Have a trip coming up?
Look ahead at your schedule to see what care your plants need before you’re off to a much needed vaycay!

• Need a speedy way to care for your plant family?
Use your task list to bulk care for your plants by room or all at once!

Journal away when you’re excited for a new sprouting leaf, worried about unwanted pesty guests, or mesmerized by the way the morning light hits your Fiddle Leaf Fig just right.


Learn New Skills:

Curious how to repot your Monstera? Need to know how to trim your Money Tree? We’ve got you covered. The Library has all the plant care tips and tricks you’ll ever need. Plant Mom approved, of course!

Having trouble? Please reach out to verasupport@bloomscape.com - We’re happy to help!
descriptionShort: Vera by Bloomscape is a care management app for plants.

appDetails.developerAddress:
19 Clifford Street
Detroit, MI 48226
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re so happy to hear that you all have been checking your soil to make sure your plant needs water before giving it a drink!

• Know that your plant isn’t quite ready to be watered yet?
Use your new “Snooze” feature to “Skip” a watering for a couple days or skip until your next scheduled date

If you run into any trouble, let us know at verasupport@bloomscape.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year, all!

Our team is glowing because of all of your kind words and stellar feedback. We're refreshed and excited to keep making Vera better with you all in 2021 =)

If you run into any trouble, let us know at verasupport@bloomscape.com

appDetails.developerAddress:
Bloomscape, Inc.

5000 Grand River Ave
Detroit, MI 48208
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update is for your plants that love a little extra humidity added to their environment =)

Mark plants as “Misted” in your bulk tasks
• A great way to quickly mark that you gave your plants a spritz!

Set a schedule for misting
• Add an extra reminder to spend quality time with your humidity loving plants

Edit dates on your notes
• Click on any activity in your plant’s profile to update the date - even notes!

Journal away when you’re excited for a new sprouting leaf, worried about unwanted pesty guests, or mesmerized by the way the morning light hits your Fiddle Leaf Fig just right.


Learn New Skills:

Curious how to repot your Monstera? Need to know how to trim your Money Tree? We’ve got you covered. The Library has all the plant care tips and tricks you’ll ever need. Plant Mom approved, of course!

Having trouble? Please reach out to verasupport@bloomscape.com - We’re happy to help!
